page.title: 18HOME LIFE IN GRANGETOWN
page.content: {My typical Saturday - Catherine Conway { ( age 11 ) { I get up about 8 a.m. and go downstairs to watch the Saturday Picture Store on T.V. For breakfast I have jam on toast and a cup of tea. I get dressed at 10 a.m. and, at 10.45 a.m. my cousin and auntie call for my Mum and me to go to Dancing. We stay there until 2.45 p.m. My Father picks us up and we go shopping in Canton. When we get home I help my Mum to cook the tea. We have Spaghetti Bolognese. I then watch T.V. in the evening and go to bed at 10.30 p.m.
